summary: This is a brief email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting someone to send them Epstein's Social Security Number (SSN). The document indicates ongoing investigative or administrative work related to Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email requesting Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number (SSN). They are an Assistant United States Attorney working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Request for Epstein's SSN
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email requesting Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: On August 8, 2019, a federal prosecutor requested Jeffrey Epstein's Social Security Number.
The request came from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
This indicates ongoing official work related to Epstein around the time of his death in August 2019.
